articles.title: Jonty Rhodes calls Symonds the 'greatest fielder ever' as cricket world mourns another tragedy
articles.description: Proteas legend Jonty Rhodes says Andrew Symonds was "arguably the greatest all-round fielder" ever following the Australian's death.
articles.content:
Proteas legend Jonty Rhodes says Andrew Symonds was "arguably the greatest all-round fielder ever" following the Australian's death on Saturday night.

articles.title: Australian cricket community rocked as Andrew Symonds dies in car crash
articles.description: Swashbuckling former all-rounder Andrew Symonds has been killed in a car crash, Cricket Australia said Sunday.
articles.content: Swashbuckling former all-rounder Andrew Symonds has been killed in a car crash, Cricket Australia said Sunday, in another tragic blow for the sport after the recent deaths of fellow greats Shane Warn… [+3532 chars]
